posts.post_content:
Offered here is a T206 Rhoades Hands At Chest. it is a nice card with excellent color, clarity and decent centering and corners. Scrape upper right corner in the very top border and light crease that is visible in the scan above his arm. Nice Sweet Caporal 350 factory No. 30 back and an overall presentable mid grade card. 
SOLD net plus 5.00 for shipping with tracking
